p: The compositions of the EOs are, as shown, very variable. The major constituents of a commercial EO of T. minuta from Madagascar were determined by Juliani and coworkers [ 69] to be α-pinene (2.0%), limonene (7.4%), dihydrotagetone (11.6%), tagetone (14.1%), ( Z)-tagetenone (6.7%), ( E)-tagetenone (9.0%), β-caryophyllene (1.1%), and bicyclogermacrene (2.2%). Two EOs distilled from Indian plant material [ 30, 70] are compared in Table 6.
